tool.name: tool_4

param.name: NUMFIELD
param.dialogReference:
Number of Points

Table field

optional

Desired number of points per polygon.

param.name: NUMPOINTS
param.dialogReference:
Number of Points

Integer

Minimum: 1

Default: 100

Desired number of points per polygon.

tool.summary: For each selected polygon of the input layer or for all polygons, if none is selected, a multi-point record is created with evenly distributed points trying to meet the specified number of points per polygon.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J. (2015): System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA) v. 2.1.4, Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 1991-2007, doi:10.5194/gmd-8-1991-2015. [SAGA - System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses - saga-gis.org]
